Room.Name: Galgorie's Copse
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a small woods of alders and oaks, thick with brush.
Room.LongDescription: Near the northern edge is a still pond and a grassy knoll. A granite and ebony headstone marks the single grave at the foot of a giant oak tree. It is the resting place of Galgorie. Galgorie was mortally wounded in his battle with the monster from the pond, but since that day the beast has never been seen again. Lyanden Road is west.
